DOC.brief_summary: Patients present emergency department acute ischemic stroke , eligible standard intravenous tPA therapy within 4.5 hour stroke onset assess `` dual target '' major vessel occlusion mismatch determine eligibility randomization trial . If patient give informed consent randomise 50:50 use central computerise allocation intravenous alteplase tenecteplase participant undergo intra-arterial clot retrieval . The trial prospective , randomised , open-label , blind endpoint ( PROBE ) design .
DOC.brief_title: Tenecteplase Versus Alteplase Before Endovascular Therapy Ischemic Stroke

Intraarterial clot retrieval treatment commence ( groin puncture ) within 6 hour stroke onset . Imaging inclusion criterion , Dual target : 5 .
